description: During the [2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0028), [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) gathered account credentials via a [BlackEnergy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0089) keylogger plugin. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)(Citation: Ukraine15 - EISAC - 201603)

external_references.description: Booz Allen Hamilton   When The Lights Went Out Retrieved. 2019/10/22

Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems. (2016, March 18). Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case. Retrieved March 27, 2018.
